import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { Fragment } from 'react' export default function Modal({closeModal, isOpen}) { const [selectedPerson, setSelectedPerson] = useState(people[0]) const [query, setQuery] = useState('') const filteredPeople = query === '' ? people : people.filter((person) => { return person.name.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase()) }) return ( <>
Add hobby
Assignee: setQuery(event.target.value)} displayValue={(person) => person.name} /> {filteredPeople.map((person) => ( {person.name} ))}
) }
